#summary Controller-less forma

= Sample Usage =

Your model class:

{{{
class Model_Person {
    public static function create($name, $sex, $sendEmail, $resume, $photo) {
        // ...
    }
}
}}}

Right inside your view script:

{{{
<?=$this->forma()
    ->addField('text', 'name')
        ->fieldLabel('Your name')
        ->fieldRequired(true)
        ->fieldAttrib('maxlength', 45)
    ->addField('select', 'sex')
        ->fieldLabel('Your sex')
        ->fieldOptions(array('female', 'male'))
    ->addField('hidden', 'sendEmail')
        ->fieldValue(true)
    ->addField('textarea', 'resume')
        ->fieldAttrib('cols', 50)
        ->fieldAttrib('rows', 5)
    ->addField('file', 'photo')
    ->addField('submit')
        ->fieldAction('Model_Person', 'create')
    ?>
}}}

That's it. The form will execute your specified method, passing there form data.
